name: Severity:Critical
description: Indicates a show-stopping issue that affects core functionality or blocks further progress.

name: Severity:High
description: A major issue that significantly impacts functionality but may have a workaround.

name: Severity:Medium
description: A moderate issue that impacts functionality but does not critically impede progress.

name: Severity:Low
description: A minor issue that has little to no impact on overall functionality.

name: Severity:Trivial
description: Issues that are barely noticeable and do not require immediate attention.
